summary:
Some of my compatibility patches/translations/minimods for Enderal.
Minimod: iNeed Waterskin in the abandoned Temple.
Translation: Enderal - Teleportzauber by KorbiGaming
Patch: Scrimshaw Extended
descriptionHtml:
[color=#006400]RXL_KG_Teleportzauber_EN patch.7z[/color]
Translates [color=#ff8c00]Enderal - Teleportzauber[/color] [color=#ff0000](required)[/color] to english. I used the "Haendler" (=Vendor) version as a basis. The original mod adds some Teleport Spells, same as the scrolls you can find. You can buy the spells in the Ark Market at Golfur...something....forgot his full name :P
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76895/?]Link to original mod[/url]
 
[color=#006400]RXL enderal iNeed Waterskin.7z[/color]
A very small Minimod that adds/hides an empty Waterskin somewhere in the Abandoned Temple, because I had a lot of trouble getting my first one.
Requires iNeed
Hint:
[spoiler]somewhere in the general vicinity of the bed in the inner part of the temple.
Another Hint:[spoiler]whoever left it there, must have gotten distracted, while trying to fill it.[/spoiler][/spoiler]
 
[color=#006400]RXL Scrimshaw Expamded lite esp replacer.7z[/color]
Esp replacer for the Lite Version of [color=#ff8c00]Hunterborn - Scrimshaw Expanded[/color] [color=#ff0000](required)[/color]. I removed all references to the DLCs in the esps, and fixed a few of the recipes. A bunch of recipes are cheaper atm, due to not available ingredients of the original recipes. I removed the missing ingredient, but didn't substitute them everywhere. I might come back to that at a later date. Some of the things might have missing meshes or textures. I checked a bunch and they all were okay, but I might have missed some. drop me a message if you find anything.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71573/?]Link to original mod[/url]

[color=#006400]RXL AkropolisByAnNaj eng patch.7z[/color]
Translates [color=#ff8c00]Enderal - Akropolis by AnNaj[/color] [color=#ff0000](required)[/color] to english. The translation might be rough at places. If you got better suggestions for translations leave me a message.
[color=#a52a2a]Note: Some of the Messages seem to be stored in the Scripts. Those aren't translated yet. I'll have to look into how to access them the best way. Most of these are related to processing the sorting functions, and shouldn't be that important, but still...[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78478/?]Link to original mod[/url]

[color=#006400]RXL moreplacables eng patch.7z[/color]
Translates [color=#ff8c00]Enderal - Erweiterte Haus-Bauplaene[/color] [color=#ff0000](required)[/color] (Enderal - expanded House Blueprints) to english. The translation might be rough at places. If you got better suggestions for translations leave me a message.
[color=#a52a2a]Note: Hopefully completly translated now. Needs Testing. Please report back if it works.[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78608/?]Link to original mod[/url]


Aditional patches (NSFW Site):
[spoiler]
Please visit my [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3323-rxl-enderal-patch-dump/]Mod Page on Loverslab[/url] for some additional patches and links to more.
[/spoiler]
author: RustyXXL
